item.title: Kerstin add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Kerstin add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "So it's you and a syringe against the Capitol? See, this is why no one lets you make the plans." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Kerstin add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "Life isn't fair, it's just fairer than death, that's all." -- William Goldman

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Juliet Marillier
item.description: "If a man has to say trust me, Gogu conveyed, it's a sure sign you cannot. Trust him, that is. Trust is a thing you know without words." -- Juliet Marillier

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "Sorrow is how we learn to love. Your heart isn't breaking. It hurts because it's getting larger. The larger it gets, the more love it holds." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Stefan Zweig
item.description: "Time to leave now, get out of this room, go somewhere, anywhere; sharpen this feeling of happiness and freedom, stretch your limbs, fill your eyes, be awake, wider awake, vividly awake in every sense and every pore." -- Stefan Zweig

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Mortimer J. Adler
item.description: "True freedom is impossible without a mind made free by discipline." -- Mortimer J. Adler

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Alan Watts
item.description: "Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth." -- Alan Watts

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by David Foster Wallace
item.description: "Everybody is identical in their secret unspoken belief that way deep down they are different from everyone else." -- David Foster Wallace

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Dylan Thomas
item.description: "Do not go gentle into that good night. Rage, rage against the dying of the light." -- Dylan Thomas

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
item.description: "Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad." -- Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Wicked people never have time for reading. It's one of the reasons for their wickedness." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Horton Foote
item.description: "I’ve known people that the world has thrown everything at to discourage them...to break their spirit. And yet something about them retains a dignity. They face life and don’t ask quarters." -- Horton Foote

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Daphne du Maurier
item.description: "But luxury has never appealed to me, I like simple things, books, being alone, or with somebody who understands." -- Daphne du Maurier

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Ved Mehta
item.description: "Surely only boring people went in for conversations consisting of questions and answers. The art of true conversation consisted in the play of minds." -- Ved Mehta

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Cynthia Ozick
item.description: "We often take for granted the very things that most deserve our gratitude." -- Cynthia Ozick

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by George Gordon Byron
item.description: "And thus the heart will break, yet brokenly live on." -- George Gordon Byron

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Daniel Defoe
item.description: "It is never too late to be wise." -- Daniel Defoe

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Adrienne Rich
item.description: "There must be those among whom we can sit down and weep and still be counted as warriors." -- Adrienne Rich

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by A.J. Cronin
item.description: "Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, but only saps today of its strength." -- A.J. Cronin

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Bei Dao
item.description: "In the world I am Always a stranger I do not understand its language It does not understand my silence" -- Bei Dao

item.title: Kerstin add a quote by Jude Deveraux
item.description: "Love can make even nice people do awful things." -- Jude Deveraux
